-Mj6pVmvWLfhdxq_qasa.definition: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is a markup language responsible for the visual elements of a website. HTML (another markup language) is used to determine the structure and content of the webpage. Web developers will then use CSS to style this content; in other words, CSS tells the browser how the HTML elements should be displayed. CSS is used to apply colors and to determine font, text size and alignment, to name just a few.
-Mj6pVmvWLfhdxq_qasa.title: CSS

-Mj6pe2C9TnH916dl-FL.definition: A crucial aspect of development and programming, data structures are a way of organizing and storing data for maximum efficiencyâ€”much like books in a library. Data structures make it easy to find, access, sort, insert and delete data. There are many different types of data structures, including linked lists, stacks, queues and sets.
-Mj6pe2C9TnH916dl-FL.title: Data Structures
